de.jcommandlineparser.options
Class AbstractMultiOption<T>

java.lang.Object
  de.jcommandlineparser.options.AbstractOption<T>
      de.jcommandlineparser.options.AbstractMultiOption<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of value
Direct Known Subclasses:
StringMultiOption
public abstract class AbstractMultiOption<T>
extends AbstractOption<T>

An abstract extension for AbstractOption. This command line option can have more than one value.

Author:
Alexander Kerner
